course_title: Pediatric Acute Care NP Practicum V
course_description: This course fully integrates the care of children that are well, acutely ill, or chronically ill with healthcare policy and change. Emphasis is on the transformation of health care within a primary care setting.
prerequisites: NRSG 817D and NRSG 818D as prerequisites, NRSG 819D as co-requisite, or equivalent transfer credit.
sections: Class Nbr: 5233, Section #: 1, Type: CLN, Campus: ATL, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: Staff, Status: Open
